bibl.title: Yet More Duplicate Mummy Labels.
bibl.note: Edition of two bilingual mummy labels (Greek / Demotic) kept in the National Museum of Ireland. - Inv. 1892:239 (from Bompae) is virtually identical with S.B. I, 1606 (= C.E.M.G. 1695) from the Louvre. - There is no published duplicate of Inv. 1892:238 (from Psonis).
bibl.seg: 143.12 / 143.4 T. Dublin National Mus. of Ireland Inv. 1892:238; 1892:239 145.4 S.B. I, 1606
MUHS Brian and Klaas A. WORP, Yet More Duplicate Mummy Labels.

Edition of two bilingual mummy labels (Greek / Demotic) kept in the National Museum of Ireland. - Inv. 1892:239 (from Bompae) is virtually identical with S.B. I, 1606 (= C.E.M.G. 1695) from the Louvre. - There is no published duplicate of Inv. 1892:238 (from Psonis).
